title: Toastainer
meta_description: Say goodbye to complicated setups and say hello to joinable serverless code. Code anywhere, in any language. Serverless the way it ought to be, an instance starts in milliseconds. Joinable & Multi-Protocol, Multiple HTTP(S), Websocket and SSH requests may join the same code instance. Seamless scaling, more code instances are automatically started when needed. Multi-Region, send a request to a location of your choosing or automatically to the nearest one.
